statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the parallelogram above. Side lengths are measurements.

solution.p: Perimeter is the sum of the sides: \displaystyle{2}{\left({5.28}+{8.64}\right)}={27.84}\approx{27.84}.
Area is height times base (side perpendicular to height): \displaystyle{8.64}\cdot{4.10}={35.424}\approx{35.4}.
